column4: I did a USB connection to my mobile and now it won't start anymore!! what did linux do to my phone?!
that's not really a useful question without more information on what you did and what sort of phone it is..
I pasted the elephants dream movie in '3gp' format inside it.. nothing more.. it's a sony w600i
the file has 58 MB and the phone had more than 200 MB free.. so it's not a memory problem
